Common.title: MapEg - Premier Recruitment Agency
Common.description: Connect with top talent and opportunities across Egypt and the Arab world

Hero.subtitle: Connect with top employers in Egypt, Saudi Arabia, UAE, and beyond. Your gateway to exceptional career opportunities.

Featured.title: Featured
Featured.subtitle: Discover handpicked positions from top employers across the region

Employers.title: Trusted by
Employers.subtitle: Join thousands of companies that trust us for their hiring needs

Testimonials.title: What Our
Testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from candidates and employers who found success with us
Testimonials.testimonial1: MapEg helped me find my dream job in just two weeks! The team was incredibly supportive throughout the process.
Testimonials.testimonial2: As an employer, MapEg has been our preferred recruitment partner. They consistently deliver high-quality candidates.
Testimonials.testimonial3: The best recruitment agency in the region. Professional, efficient, and always exceeding expectations.

CTA.title: Ready to Take the Next Step?
CTA.subtitle: Whether you're looking for your dream job or the perfect candidate, we're here to help.

Footer.aboutText: Connecting talent with opportunity across the Middle East. We bridge the gap between ambitious professionals and world-class organizations.
Footer.tagline: Connecting talent with opportunities across Egypt and the Arab world. Your gateway to career success.

About.title: About
About.subtitle: Connecting talent with opportunity in Egypt and the Arab world since 2018
About.missionText1: To be the bridge that connects exceptional talent with outstanding opportunities, transforming career paths and building successful organizations across the Arab world.
About.missionText2: We believe the right job can change a life, and the right hire can transform a business. That's why we're committed to making meaningful connections that create lasting value for both candidates and employers.
About.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
About.excellenceDesc: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from candidate matching to client service.
About.integrityDesc: We operate with transparency and honesty, building trust with all our stakeholders.
About.innovationDesc: We constantly improve our processes and technology to deliver better results.
About.diversityDesc: We celebrate diversity and believe in equal opportunities for all.
About.milestone1Desc: MapEg was born with a mission to transform recruitment in Egypt.
About.milestone2Desc: Opened offices in Dubai and Riyadh to serve the Gulf market.
About.milestone3Desc: Reached a major milestone of successfully placing 10,000 candidates.
About.milestone4Desc: Became the #1 recruitment platform in Egypt and the Arab world.
About.leadershipSubtitle: The passionate team driving our mission
About.team1Bio: Former HR Director at Fortune 500 companies with 15+ years of recruitment experience.
About.team2Bio: Operations expert with experience in scaling startups across the MENA region.
About.team3Bio: Passionate about connecting the right talent with the right opportunities.
About.team4Bio: Building strategic relationships with top employers in the Arab world.
About.officesSubtitle: Strategically located to serve you better

Contact.title: Get in
Contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Let us know how we can help.
Contact.formSubtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
Contact.subject: Subject *
Contact.thankYou: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.
Contact.faq1Question: How long does the hiring process take?
Contact.faq1Answer: The average time to hire is 2-4 weeks, depending on your profile and available positions.
Contact.faq2Answer: No, our services are completely free for job seekers. Employers pay for recruitment services.
Contact.faq3Question: Which countries do you operate in?
Contact.faq3Answer: We operate in Egypt, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Qatar, Kuwait, Bahrain, Oman, Jordan, Lebanon, and Morocco.
Contact.faq4Answer: Employers can register on our platform and start posting jobs immediately. Contact our sales team for custom solutions.

EmployersPage.heroSubtitle: Partner with MapEg to find exceptional candidates in Egypt and the Arab world
EmployersPage.whyHireSubtitle: Everything you need to build your dream team
EmployersPage.benefit1Desc: Access to over 15,000 pre-vetted candidates across Egypt and the Arab world.
EmployersPage.benefit2Desc: Fill positions 3x faster with our streamlined recruitment process.
EmployersPage.benefit3Desc: Reduce hiring costs by up to 50% compared to traditional methods.
EmployersPage.benefit4Desc: Deep understanding of local markets in 10+ Arab countries.
EmployersPage.benefit5Desc: Personal account manager to guide you through the hiring process.
EmployersPage.benefit6Desc: Track applications, candidate quality, and hiring metrics in real-time.
EmployersPage.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your recruitment needs
EmployersPage.readyToHireSubtitle: Register your company and start posting jobs in minutes. Our team will reach out to help.
EmployersPage.aboutPlaceholder: Tell us about your company and hiring needs...

CandidatesPage.heroSubtitle: Create your profile and get discovered by top employers in Egypt and the Arab world
CandidatesPage.benefit1Desc: Your profile is visible to over 2,500 top employers in the region.
CandidatesPage.benefit2Desc: Receive personalized job recommendations that match your skills.
CandidatesPage.benefit3Desc: Monitor the status of your applications in real-time from your dashboard.
CandidatesPage.benefit4Desc: Access interview tips, salary guides, and career advice.
CandidatesPage.addResume: Add your resume to complete your profile
CandidatesPage.dragDrop: Drag and drop your resume here

Blog.heroSubtitle: Expert advice, industry trends, and success stories to help you grow your career
Blog.subscribeText: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest career tips and job market insights.
Blog.post1Title: 10 Tips for Your Next Job Interview
Blog.post1Excerpt: Prepare yourself for success with these proven interview strategies that will help you stand out.
Blog.post2Title: The Future of Work in the Middle East
Blog.post2Excerpt: Explore emerging trends shaping the job market in Egypt and the Arab world in 2025 and beyond.
Blog.post3Title: How to Write a Resume That Gets Noticed
Blog.post3Excerpt: Learn the secrets to crafting a compelling resume that will grab the attention of recruiters.
Blog.post4Excerpt: Discover the skills employers are looking for and how to develop them to advance your career.
Blog.post5Title: Remote Work: Best Practices for Success
Blog.post5Excerpt: Master the art of working from home with productivity tips and work-life balance strategies.
Blog.post6Excerpt: Learn how to negotiate your salary with confidence and get the compensation you deserve.
